**Avalanche Forecasting System Replacement**
===========================

**Notification**
---------------

Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to replace the Avalance Forecasting System (AFS) information system by November 30, 2025.

**Tender Details**
------------------

- **Tender Reference**: CB-435-9136440
- **Amendment Number**: 9
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P047-23-0067/A
- **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 13, 2024, 2:00 pm EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: November 30, 2025

**Procurement Requirements**
---------------------------

Parks Canada is looking for a complete replacement of the legacy Avalanche Forecasting System (AFS) information system by November 2025. The successful bidder must submit a comprehensive proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the tender document.

**Contract Period and Warranty**
-------------------------------

The period of the Contract is from the contract date to November 30, 2025, inclusive. The Contractor agrees to provide a warranty for a period of 12 months from the date of delivery.

**Requirements for Bids**
-------------------------

All bids must be submitted electronically via email to [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca). The preferred method of bid submission is email. Bids received via fax or courier will be accepted as official.

**Enquiries and Bidders' Conference**
-----------------------------------

All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date. A bidders' conference will be held on January 3, 2024. The scope of the requirement outlined in the bid solicitation will be reviewed, and questions will be answered. Bidders are encouraged to attend or send a representative.

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche). Addenda will be available from this website.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact Christine Lajoie, Contracting Authority,
